```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(worldfootballR)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
all_urls <- fb_match_urls(
  country         = "ENG",
  gender          = "M",
  season_end_year = "2023",
  tier            = "1st"
)



pass <- data.frame()
for (i in 1:380) {
  temp_url=all_urls[i]
  temp_pass <- fb_advanced_match_stats( match_url      = temp_url, 
                                    stat_type      = "passing",
                                    team_or_player = "team")
  pass <- bind_rows(pass, temp_pass)
}

head(pass)
write.csv(pass,
          file = "pass_EPL_23.csv",
          row.names = FALSE)
```
